short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that add button "Toggle Pega" ruleset for Tracer Configuration

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension that add button "Toggle Pega " ruleset for Tracer Configuration for Pega Tracer tool.

if pega rulesets are already selected , on click all pega rulesets will be deselected.
and if pega rulesets are already deselected , on click all pega rulesets will be selected again.

happy toggling...
